byline.original: By HADLEY CANTRIL Director, Princeton Public Opinion Research Project

abstract: article by H Cantril on Princeton Pub Opinion Research Project poll of Amer opinion; chart
snippet: Since the war in Europe has become a grim reality challenging the attention of the American people, it has forced decision and the weighing of alternative courses of action....

headline.main: IMPACT OF THE WAR ON THE NATION'S VIEWPOINT; Surveys Show Increasing Desire to Find Ways of Aiding the Allies

lead_paragraph: Since the war in Europe has become a grim reality challenging the attention of the American people, it has forced decision and the weighing of alternative courses of action.
